content: Okay, so the first batch of materials needed for the new store is <style=Highlight>{木材}</style>. Lemme check...
info: 交付木材-格连_格连主引入语

content: <style=Highlight>{木材}</style>... all set! By the way, I've got something for you, a little gift for the new shop's "number one customer"...
info: 交付木材-格连_格连主引入语

content: Let me take a look at my notebook... For the second batch, we'll need <style=Highlight>quartz</style>! <style=SizeSmall>Oh dear, do we even have that much quartz on our planet?</style>
info: 交付木材-格连_格连主引入语

content: {A歪头}U-Um, it seems you haven't gathered enough yet... You should be able to gather the required materials by chopping trees with your mattock. Keep at it! Is there anything else you need?
info: 交付木材-格连_格连主引入语

content: {A笑哈哈}That's right, it's you, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, our shop's "number one customer." <style=SizeSmall>I'm getting more excited by the minute...</style>
info: 交付木材-格连_格连主引入语

content: {A灵光一现}Oh! And you could go on a <style=Highlight>Starsea Voyage</style>. Out there, you'll find plenty more ore. As for how to embark on a voyage... just <style=Highlight>ask Esassani</style>!
info: 交付木材-格连_格连主引入语
